subject: Football
Labor and Jobs
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L. won a labor skirmish when the special master Stephen Burbank upheld the implementation of the supplemental revenue-sharing program adopted with the 2006 collective bargaining agreement.
snippet: The N.F.L. won a labor skirmish when the special master Stephen Burbank upheld the implementation of the supplemental revenue-sharing program adopted with the 2006 collective bargaining agreement.
